intro: Psychotria heterosticta, commonly known as the red psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil and Colombia. The plant is characterized by its elliptical, dark green leaves and clusters of small, white flowers. Its fruit is a capsule that contains numerous tiny seeds. Psychotria heterosticta is often found in humid, shaded environments within rainforests.
